title: Helping our junglers. New item + enchanted for jungle item. "Shurima's Brace" + "Gaurdian".
body:
Riot has tried to make a good tank item for our junglers which backfired horribly *Cinderhulk*
so while talking to some Rioters and reading about some threads I decided to try and create a new item.

Now before I go into things we need list/Discuss the items at hand.

"Hunter's Machete" = 400 Gold.
+ 15 Bonus gold per Large Monster kill.
Passive- Jungler: Deal 30 Magic DMG on hit to monsters over 2 seconds,
and gain 7 HP and 3 MP while in combat with monsters.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So you gain gold per kill and deal bonus DMG whle gaining some HP/MP back.
now what Cinderhulk did *Which got abused* was AoE DMG while getting stronger per lvl and stacked up. *Opps -Riot*
^ Because it was a replacement/Substitution for an early sun-fire cape.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So I thought about creating a tank based item that can only be used in the jungle *So some smart ass laner cant abuse it*.

So what does a tanky jungler need? Health and Armor of course.


"Ruby Crystal" = 400 Gold.
+ 150 Health.

"Cloth Armor" = 300 Gold.
+ 15 armor.

Pretty simple stuff yeah?
*I was thinking of adding in a magic mantle but a jungler doesnt need MR against monsters and so I removed it*

So now lets combine these items into a new one.

Ruby + Cloth + 300 Gold = "Shurima's Brace"
+ 20 Armor
+ 250 HP
Unique Passive- Shurima's Cloak:
Gain + 4 Armor per Monster near you. *Max- 16*
and 25% Base HP Regen in combat with Monsters.

^ This should make it only useful while in the jungle and thus cannot be abused by laners.
Because the regen and armor are only useful while near monsters *Not Minions*.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now obviously the jungle item can upgrade.

Upgraded Jungle item + 450 Gold.
+ 30 Bonus gold per large Minion kill.
+ X-Y-Z different passives.
	-Chilling Smite
	-Scavanging Smite
	-Blasting Smite
	-Challenging Smite

so you get the second tier jungle item *850 Gold in total* + Shurima's Cloak *1000 in total* add another 400 gold.
*To make it worth 2250 the same as every other jungle item*

and now you get your new Jungle Item.
Enchantment: "Gaurdian" *Like Warrior-Magus etc*
+ 30 Armor.
+ 400 Health Points.
+ 30 Move Speed.

Unique Passive- Shurima's Cloak: *Upgraded a little*
Gain + 6 Armor per Monster near you. *Max- 24*
and 50% Base HP Regen in combat with Monsters.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now lets compare this to Cinderhulk.
*For this I will be doing "Stalkers Blade with Cinderhulk*

+ 300 HP
25% Base HP regen.
Chilling smite-
Jungler passive-
~Immolate~ <== we want to look at this one.

^ Deals 15 ( + 0.6 champion lvl) as an AoE but deals 100% more DMG to monsters.
At lvl 18 Immolate now deals about 25 as an AoE (50 to monsters) I think the Base amount does not change so I left it.
This may seem small but this allows massive wave clear and bonus DMG to enemy champions.

So a big huge hulk like Mundo who runs TP + Smite top will get this enchantment for AoE clear + Free DMG.
as well as having his own % of HP DMG.

Now if we compare to what Ive done.
We get 100 More HP.
25% more HP regen.
Some small amount of move speed. (= to basic boots)
and Armor + Armor based on what camp you are clearing.

So this removes AoE clear and grants more of a sustain option as well as being more tanky.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Originally I did have Magic Mantle as apart of the build so that Junglers can build both Armor and MR.
But decided to remove it, I will Copy and paste my original notes it it however.
I was also going to add that it also has a ward charge *Like sightstone as its also made up from a ruby crystal* But only had 1 charge. 
(So lee sin/Jax can get it feel tanky and can still do ward jumps.)
I was also going to draw something like the Ascension symbol on like an armband, but I seem to have misplaced my Tablet at this time :(

----------
Cloth Armor + Magic Mantle + 200 Gold. (1000 Gold Total) 
= Shurimas Brace.
Grants Armor + Magic Resistance.
Unique Passive: Shurima's Cloak.
Grants 4 Armor per monster nearby. *Max = 16
Grants 2 MR per monster nearby. *Max = 8
---------- <== removed Magic Mantle for HP

What do you guys think/Want in the jungle.
Something that cannot be abused by sneaky laners.

replies.body:
turn the mobility into a % bonus, and it might be a valid idea.
However, the first reason for cinderhulk was to give tanky junglers a way to clear. Your item doesn't help in that, so it wouldn't substitute cinderhulk.

Yeah im starting to think the % move speed might be better thank you for that.
Also this inst meant to replace cinderhulk, but provide another option Tank based junglers can go, and hopefully wont be abused by top laners.
But Cinderhulk stays, leaving us with the issue.

Yeah I know.
The thing I think they should do is tone down the DMG a little bit or some stat that may make laners think twice of getting it.

Or make it so the Jungle cinderhulk item can only affect minions/monsters and not champions

This could be abused by junglers (or even midlaners) in fights, since fights in midlane would be near raptors giving you bonus armor.
Though I would SO play rammus with this ^^
Yeah, thats why the Aura for it would be really small. So you have to be right in front of the camp in order to receive the buffs.
But what about ranged junglers like Elise? Not that Elise would buy the item, but still...

Elise isnt ranged? She is mainly Melee.
But if you mean fiddle sticks and so on. Most camps will still have to melee you meaning the aura is still justified.

But I can see some Shyvana tops wanting that move speed.

Its mainly to help slow tanky junglers (Amumu).
should give it 20-25% tenacity, otherwise its practically useless, {{item:3143}} would be practically the same thin, but stronger, the slow being a stronger compensation to the to bonus movement.

The Tenacity might not be too bad either, because tanks could use that.
And this is what its for.
